title: DFI Technologies Introduces New Android Rugged Tablet for Industrial Automation
text: DFI Technologies Introduces New Android Rugged Tablet for Industrial Automation Tablet design and components geared especially for harsh industrial and defense industry requirements Equipped with barcode reader options and near field communication (NFC), the ART101 rugged tablet offers a cost-effective solution to many application needs. SACRAMENTO, CA, September 09,   DFI Technologies, a leading provider of a wide range of embedded products for industrial applications, today unveiled the new ART101rugged tablet. ART101 is an industrial Android-powered 10.1'' tablet which offers a full touch-centric experience like any personal tablet for maximum user friendliness and portability. Additionally, the rugged design and components of the ART101 series protects the tablet's powerful features from harsh environments in manufacturing and warehousing. Equipped with barcode reader options and near field communication (NFC), the ART101 rugged tablet offers a cost-effective solution to many application needs. ART101's comprehensive wireless communication including 3G, 802.11 a/b/g/n and Bluetooth 4.0 ensures real-time data transmission in the field or within four walls. Top it off with full shift operation support, your workers would surely be well prepared with this powerful device. Quality Control in Manufacturing "We are excited to include the ART101 into our diverse product portfolio," said David Lu, CEO of DFI Technologies. "The ART101 is an Android rugged tablet designed with enterprise's need in mind. We are confident that the new ART101 will provide a value-priced solution for a variety of use cses and industries." Aside from all of its advantages, running on Android 4.2 operating system, the ART101 provides an intuitive user experience with a lightweight design. Its 10.1'' multi touch display brings up more viewable data at a time to speed up information checking and let users get their job done easily. Besides, the ART101 rugged tablet is resistant to IP65 and 1m drops onto concrete so that its functions are well protected to performance. DFI Technologies is an industry leader in designing, configuring, building and servicing embedded computer systems for use in a variety of industries, including gaming, industrial automation, aerospace and defense, transportation, healthcare, hospitality, and financial services. To learn more about DFI's ne online store and our embedded solutions, please visit http://www.dfitech.com . About DFI Technologies DFI Technologies provides high quality, long life, custom computing solutions to meet the embedded computer and motherboard needs of a variety of industries, including Gaming, Medical Device & Healthcare, Digital Signage, Interactive Kiosks, Transportation, Industrial Automation, Communications, and Security. Located in Sacramento since 1985, and winner of multiple awards for its rapid and sustained growth, DFI Technologies excels in designing, integrating, and servicing small form factor, fanless, all-in-one, and multi-function industrial-grade PCs with the longest product lifecycle in the industry.
